revised_title: Wave Propagation and Spiral Patterns in Cellular Slime Mould Aggregation Fields
tldr: The article investigates wave propagation and spiral patterns in the cellular slime mould Dictyostelium discoideum using a mathematical model. The model predicts the experimentally observed speed, amplitude, and wavelength of axisymmetric and spiral waves, providing insights into the dynamics of aggregation and chemotaxis in this organism.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cellular Biology
